definition: conforming to the standards and conventions of the middle class, a person who is reluctant to accept changes and new ideas
details:
adjective
- conforming to the standards and conventions of the middle class
= synonyms: bourgeois
- resistant to change
- unimaginatively conventional
= synonyms: button-down, buttoned-down
- avoiding excess
= example: avoiding excess
= synonyms: cautious
- having social or political views favoring conservatism
noun
- a person who is reluctant to accept changes and new ideas
= synonyms: conservativist
